short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UberEats Memo is a simple memo tool that adds a memo input box to each item.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever found yourself fluttering through a restaurant menu like a butterfly lost in direction, only to land on dishes you don't quite adore? Or when your pizza arrives, you realize you forgot to say, 'No bell peppers, please!'? Worry not, for we have developed an app that acts like your smart yet forgetful culinary companion. Below each meal, you can add a tiny note, jotting down all your likes and dislikes in detail. So, the next time you yearn to relish that delicious pasta, you won't unexpectedly find yourself drowning in a sea of hated bell peppers again. Now, let's march together towards a better dining experience!
